dmca.title: NetEnforcers complains of  images in Froogle
dmca.body:
Mon, 27 Nov 2006 15:24:19 -0500

Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints
 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named [ Sony Home Audio ] ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.
 

Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [ Sony Home Audio ] / :
 

Discountav                   CDP-CX355  
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.discountav.com/images/catalog/Brand_images/Sony/CDPCX355.jpg&size=2&dhm=e5062d04&hl=en
 

World Gifts                  CDP-CX355  
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://images.wofgifts.com/4616455.jpg&size=2&dhm=e9d8df0f&hl=en
 

Yimg                            CDP-CX355
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://us.st8.yimg.com/store1.yimg.com/I/awardsforexcellence_1851_27667884&size=2&dhm=baaa7d4d&hl=en
 

Shop.com                     CDP-CX355
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://shop.com.edgesuite.net/ccimg.shop.com/220000/227200/227236/Products/20919977.jpg&size=2&dhm=9fc59242&hl=en
 

Buy Donlin                   CDP-CX355
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://raq4.buydonlin.com/Merchant2/images/products/CDPCX355.jpg&size=2&dhm=b0bff361&hl=en
 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 

Printed Name: [Phillip Williamson]
Title & Company: [Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.]
Street Address: [P.O. Box 2132]
City and State: [Gainesville, FL]
Zip: [32601]
Email (ended auction inquiries)*: [Ebay.Violations@NetEnforcers.com]
Fax: [954.827.2381]
Date: [ 11/27/06]
 

Truthfully,
/S/:  Phillip Williamson
